dataList.text: my position in Magnet Ad services is Front-End developer with react js and UX researcher and design wireframe based on best flow for users From 2019 to now.

Proficient in developing Single Page Applications(SPA) using JavaScript MVC framework such as React JS.

creation wireframes and process maps using Balsamiq and adobe xd.

my position in Ansar Information of Technology Co was Front-End developer with angular js and angular 2 and Mentored new team members From 2017 To 2019.
Responsibilities:
Developed many banking projects with angularjs & angular2.
Work with senior developer to develop a large scale angular2 framework & Created custom Angular2 components for internal framework.
Hands on experience in Responsive Design and Media Queries.
working with team members for resolving front end CSS issues & Trained 2 interns on HTML5 , CSS3 , Angular ,Sass , Bootsrap ,Typescript.
Collaborated with team on implementing new features and UX in an Agile environment.
Trained Scrum methodology to team members.
Mentored new team members.
Online Project: https://mahersan.ansarbank.ir/ . This project have been developed by angular2.
